= −4 |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = 13-19084 |blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = 0312868 |website = |footnotes = }} Comer is a city in Madison County, Georgia, United States. Comer is the largest city in Madison County based on population and total land area. The City of Comer's motto is "Make Our Town Your Town". ==References== Category:Cities in Georgia (U.S. state)
